Template

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Details

  • Extends: USWDS Template component
  • Honeycrisp: Template atom
  • Customization: Design tokens and Styles

The Template extends the USWDS Template component. The visual appearance is modified using design tokens applied to the USWDS Template component settings from the Honeycrisp Template atom.

Accessibility

  1. Existing research references

  2. Manual accessibility tests

  3. Automated accessibility tests

  4. Basic usability tests

  5. Assistive tech usability tests
